PHRASE.LANG: Relax anywhere in your own personal lawn chair from the Giftinator 9000 from Hellfire Games. Includes a custom run animation when the avatar is moving at its full running speed. The speed boost is engaged when the avatar is moving at its full running speed. [#Legal]
Détendez-vous dans votre chaise personnelle de jardin du Giftinator 9000 d'Hellfire Games. Le boost de vitesse est activé quand l'avatar se déplace à sa vitesse maximale. [#Legal]

Entspanne in deinem persönlichen Liegestuhl aus dem Geschenkomat 9000 von Hellfire Games. Der Geschwindigkeitsschub setzt automatisch ein, wenn der Avatar sich mit voller Geschwindigkeit bewegt. [#Legal]

Rilassatevi sulla vostra sedia a sdraio personale direttamente dal Giftinator 9000 di Hellfire Games. Potrai dare una spinta di accelerazione quando l'avatar avrà raggiunto la massima velocità. [#Legal]
Relájate en tumbona personal del Giftinator 9000 de Hellfire Games. El turbo se activa cuando el avatar se mueve a su velocidad de carrera completa. [#Legal]

Relax anywhere in your own personal lawn chair from the Giftinator 9000 from Hellfire Games. Includes a custom run animation when the avatar is moving at its full running speed. The speed boost is engaged when the avatar is moving at its full running speed. [#Legal]

Relax anywhere in your own personal lawn chair from the Giftinator 9000 from Hellfire Games. Includes a custom run animation when the avatar is moving at its full running speed. The speed boost is engaged when the avatar is moving at its full running speed. [#Legal]
